member.name: T:CodeProject.GraphComponents.GridStyles
member.summary: Style in which the gridlines appear on the graph.

member.name: F:CodeProject.GraphComponents.GridStyles.None
member.summary: No Grid.

member.name: F:CodeProject.GraphComponents.GridStyles.Horizontal
member.summary: Horizontal lines only.

member.name: F:CodeProject.GraphComponents.GridStyles.Vertical
member.summary: Vertical lines only.

member.name: F:CodeProject.GraphComponents.GridStyles.Grid
member.summary: Grid lines.

member.name: T:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Orientation
member.summary: Orientation of the bar on the BarGraph.

member.name: F:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Orientation.Vertical
member.summary: Vertical.

member.name: F:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Orientation.Horizontal
member.summary: Horizontal.

member.name: T:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Graduation
member.summary: The location where the graduations must appear.

member.name: F:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Graduation.None
member.summary: No graduations.

member.name: F:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Graduation.Center
member.summary: Centre.

member.name: F:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Graduation.Edge1
member.summary: Edge 1.

member.name: F:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Graduation.Edge2
member.summary: Edge 2.

member.name: T:CodeProject.GraphComponents.TextAlignment
member.summary: Style in which the bar's values are to be displayed on the bar.

member.name: F:CodeProject.GraphComponents.TextAlignment.AbsoluteCenter
member.summary: Absolute centre.

member.name: F:CodeProject.GraphComponents.TextAlignment.BarValueCenter
member.summary: Bar value centre.

member.name: F:CodeProject.GraphComponents.TextAlignment.Smart
member.summary: Use smart positioning.

member.name: F:CodeProject.GraphComponents.TextAlignment.None
member.summary: None.

member.name: T:CodeProject.GraphComponents.TimeAxisStyle
member.summary: Style in which the time axis value is to be shown.

member.name: F:CodeProject.GraphComponents.TimeAxisStyle.Millisecond
member.summary: Shows the time in milliseconds relative to the start of the plot eg. 10, 20, ..., 50000.

member.name: F:CodeProject.GraphComponents.TimeAxisStyle.MillisecondWithUnitDisplay
member.summary: Shows the time in milliseconds relative to the start of the plot, with the 'ms' suffix eg. 10ms, 20ms, ..., 50000ms.

member.name: F:CodeProject.GraphComponents.TimeAxisStyle.Second
member.summary: Shows the time in seconds relative to the start of the plot eg. 10, 20, ..., 50000.

member.name: F:CodeProject.GraphComponents.TimeAxisStyle.SecondWithUnitDisplay
member.summary: Shows the time in seconds relative to the start of the plot, with the 's' suffix eg. 10s, 20s, ..., 50000s.

member.name: F:CodeProject.GraphComponents.TimeAxisStyle.Smart
member.summary: Shows the time in the most appropriate format relative to the start of the plot.

member.name: F:CodeProject.GraphComponents.TimeAxisStyle.Absolute
member.summary: Shows the absolute time in the format HH:MM:SS.xx e.g. 01:24:37.67. Used when displaying historic data.

member.name: T:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Plotter
member.summary: A user control to plot the value (y) of a variable against time (t).

member.name: T:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Graph
member.summary: The base class for graphs. Provides the basic framework of a graph.

member.name: T:CodeProject.GraphComponents.IGraphElement
member.summary: Defines the drawing constraint that all graph types must implement.

member.name: F:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Graph.components
member.summary: Required designer variable.

member.name: M:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Graph.Finalize
member.summary: Destructor / Finalizer. Because Dispose() calls the GC.SuppressFinalize() method, this method is called by the garbage collection process only if the consumer of the object doesn't call the Dispose() method, as it should.

member.name: M:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Graph.Dispose
member.summary: Public implementation of the IDisposable.Dispose method. Called by the consumer of the object in order to free unmanaged resources deterministically.

member.name: M:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Graph.Dispose(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Clean up any resources that are currently being used.
member.param: True, if the managed resources should be disposed of; otherwise, false.

member.name: F:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Graph.m_IsDisposed
member.summary: Flag to ensure that the Dispose method is only called once.

member.name: F:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Graph.m_GraphArea
member.summary: The area of the rectangle that is bounded by the 2 axes. This is the area of the graph without any margins.

member.name: F:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Graph.m_GraphAreaColor
member.summary: The color of the GraphArea.

member.name: F:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Graph.m_Gridlines
member.summary: The style of the gridlines.

member.name: F:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Graph.m_GridlineColor
member.summary: The color of the gridlines.

member.name: F:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Graph.m_Transparency
member.summary: The amount of transparency in the bar. Values range from 0 to 255, 0 is fully transparent, 255 is opaque.

member.name: F:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Graph.m_GraduationsX
member.summary: The number of graduations on the X axis.

member.name: F:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Graph.m_GraduationsY
member.summary: The number of graduations on the Y axis.

member.name: F:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Graph.m_XAxisColor
member.summary: Color of the X axis.

member.name: F:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Graph.m_YAxisColor
member.summary: Color of the Y axis.

member.name: F:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Graph.m_ValueFormat
member.summary: The .NET style of format for displaying the value. Eg. {0:F}, {0:E} etc.

member.name: M:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Graph.Cleanup(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Clean up the resources used by the user control.
member.param: True, to release both managed and unmanaged resources; false to release only unmanaged resources.

member.name: M:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Graph.RefreshDisplay
member.summary: Refreshes the display by updating the control. This is the refresh method used during runtime and in the designer.

member.name: M:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Graph.Draw(System.Drawing.Graphics)
member.summary: Draw the graph component. This method is overridden in the derived class.

member.name: P:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Graph.IsDisposed
member.summary: Gets or sets the flag which indicates whether the Dispose() method has been called. True, indicates that the Dispose() method has been called; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Graph.ValueFormat
member.summary: Gets or sets the .NET style of format for displaying the value and axis. Eg. {0:F}, {0:E} etc.

member.name: P:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Graph.XAxisColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the color of the X axis.

member.name: P:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Graph.YAxisColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the color of the Y axis.

member.name: P:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Graph.Transparency
member.summary: Gets or sets the amount of transparency in the bar. Values range from 0 to 255, 0 is fully transparent, 255 is opaque.

member.name: P:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Graph.GridlineColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the color of the gridlines.

member.name: P:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Graph.GraphAreaColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the color of the graph's area.

member.name: P:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Graph.Gridlines
member.summary: Gets or sets the style of the gridlines.

member.name: P:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Graph.GraduationsX
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of graduations on the X axis.

member.name: P:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Graph.GraduationsY
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of graduations on the Y axis.

member.name: P:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Graph.GraphArea
member.summary: Gets or sets the area of the rectangle that is bounded by the 2 axes i.e. the area of the graph without any margins.

member.name: F:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Plotter.FormatStringNumeric
member.summary: The .NET format string used to display a value in numeric format. Value: "{0}".

member.name: F:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Plotter.FormatStringHex
member.summary: The format string used to display a value in hexadecimal format e.g. 0F0A. Value: "0x{0:X}".

member.name: F:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Plotter.CS
member.summary: Centisecond (cs) represented as a number of milliseconds. Value: 100.

member.name: F:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Plotter.Second
member.summary: Second represented as a number of milliseconds. Value: 1,000.

member.name: F:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Plotter.Minute
member.summary: Minute represented as a number of milliseconds. value: 60,000.

member.name: F:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Plotter.Hour
member.summary: Hour represented as a number of milliseconds. Value: 3,600,000.

member.name: F:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Plotter.Day
member.summary: Day represented as a number of milliseconds. Value: 86,400,000

member.name: F:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Plotter.CursorResolution
member.summary: The maximum resolution, in ms, for the cursor position associated with the XYText display. Value: 10

member.name: F:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Plotter.CursorResolutionHalf
member.summary: Half the maximum resolution, in ms, for the cursor position associated with the XYText display. Value: CursorResolution/2.

member.name: F:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Plotter.FindYLowerLimitAsMultiple
member.summary: Used to specify the lower limit, as a multiple of the DataInterval, of the search associated with the FindY() method. This method is used to find the Y value corresponding to the specified time value, however, as the method uses iterative procedures a lower limit must be specified to terminate the search in case no corresponding value exists. Value: 3 data intervals. Value: 3.

member.name: F:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Plotter.DefaultPlotIntervalMs
member.summary: The default plot interval, in ms. Value: 50.

member.name: F:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Plotter.DefaultDataIntervalMs
member.summary: The default data interval for historic plots. Value: 50.

member.name: F:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Plotter.FindYResolution
member.summary: The resolution, in ms, associated with the FixdY method i.e. the value by which the search is decremented every pass. Value: 10.

member.name: F:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Plotter.TripLineWidth
member.summary: The width of the vertical line drawn to represent the time of the trip. Value: 2.

member.name: F:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Plotter.TransparencyXYText
member.summary: The transparency of the XYText. Value: 130.

member.name: F:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Plotter.GraduationBorder
member.summary: The required border around the X axis text between graduations. Value: 10.0F.

member.name: F:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Plotter.SelectedAreaBorder
member.summary: The selected area border. Value: 2.

member.name: F:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Plotter.XAxisBorder
member.summary: The X axis border. Value: 6.

member.name: F:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Plotter.StatusMessageBorder
member.summary: The border value for the status message. Value: 6.

member.name: F:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Plotter.components
member.summary: Required Designer Variable.

member.name: M:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Plotter.InitializeComponent
member.summary: Required method for Designer support - do not modify the contents of this method with the code editor.

member.name: F:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Plotter.m_HScrollBar
member.summary: Reference to the HScrollBar control.

member.name: F:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Plotter.m_ContextMenuStrip
member.summary: Object reference to the context menu associated with the plotter.

member.name: F:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Plotter.m_SelectedControlList
member.summary: A generic list of the selected user controls.

member.name: F:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Plotter.m_MultiCursor
member.summary: A static flag to control whether: (true) the cursors for all visible plots are displayed or (false) only the cursor associated with the selected control is displayed.

member.name: F:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Plotter.m_InvalidData
member.summary: A flag that indicates whether the data associated with the current plot is invalid. True, if the data is invalid; otherwise, false.

member.name: F:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Plotter.m_MouseHoverCoordinates
member.summary: The coordinates of the mouse when it is hovering over the plotter.

member.name: F:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Plotter.m_IsFaultLog
member.summary: A flag to indicate whether the data corresponds to fault log data. True, if the data corresponds to a fault log; otherwise, false.

member.name: F:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Plotter.m_UseHexFormat
member.summary: A flag to indicate whether the value is to be displayed in hexadecimal format. True, if the value is to be displayed in hexadecimal format; otherwise, false.

member.name: F:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Plotter.m_XRangeSelection
member.summary: A record of the selected new start and stop times for adjusting the time span of the display.

member.name: F:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Plotter.m_XRange
member.summary: The default range, as a TimeSpan, to use for the X axis.

member.name: F:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Plotter.m_PlotIntervalMs
member.summary: The interval, in ms, between successive plot updates.
member.remarks: This variable is associated with live data plots.

member.name: F:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Plotter.m_TotalTimeElapsed
member.summary: The total time elapsed, in ms, since plotting began.
member.remarks: This variable is associated with live data plots.

member.name: F:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Plotter.m_DataIntervalMs
member.summary: The interval,in ms, between successive data entries saved in the channel reference.
member.remarks: This is associated with historic data display.

member.name: F:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Plotter.m_ActiveChannelIndex
member.summary: The index of the currently active channel.

member.name: F:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Plotter.m_Gridline
member.summary: Used to draw the gridline.

member.name: F:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Plotter.m_AxisLineXandY
member.summary: Used to draw the x and y axis line.

member.name: F:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Plotter.m_LeftDisplayLimit
member.summary: The time value, in ms since the start of the plot, associated with the left edge of the plotter.

member.name: F:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Plotter.m_RightDisplayLimit
member.summary: The time value, in ms since the start of the plot, associated with the left edge of the plotter.

member.name: F:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Plotter.m_PointsToRemove
member.summary: The number of points to remove from the left side as we go on scrolling. If the scroll bar is at the complete left, the number of points to remove is 0. If it is at the complete right, then m_PointsToRemove is m_TotalPointsToRemove.

member.name: F:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Plotter.m_TotalPointsToRemove
member.summary: The number of points to remove from the left as the plotter continues scrolling.

member.name: F:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Plotter.m_CurrentState
member.summary: The current state of the plotter.

member.name: F:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Plotter.m_GraphAreaNormalColor
member.summary: The default color of the GraphArea.

member.name: F:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Plotter.m_TripTime
member.summary: The actual time of trip, if the data corresponds to a fault log.

member.name: F:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Plotter.m_StartTime
member.summary: The start time of the recorded data. Only used in Stop Mode.

member.name: F:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Plotter.m_AnalogueIOType
member.summary: Defines the type of plot i.e. Single Analogue, Triple Analogue, defaults to TripleAnalogue.

member.name: F:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Plotter.m_GraphAreaSelectedColor
member.summary: The GraphArea colour to be used when the component is selected.

member.name: F:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Plotter.m_CrossHairColor
member.summary: The color of the vertical cross hair line used to show the position of the cursor.

member.name: F:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Plotter.m_GraphMarginLeft
member.summary: The left side margin width of the graph.

member.name: F:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Plotter.m_GraphMarginTop
member.summary: The upper margin width of the graph.

member.name: F:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Plotter.m_GraphMarginRight
member.summary: The right side margin width of the graph.

member.name: F:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Plotter.m_GraphMarginBottom
member.summary: The lower margin width of the graph. In stopped/pause mode a scroll bar appears if the graphs dont fit, so take the scroll bar height into account.

member.name: F:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Plotter.m_ChannelCollection
member.summary: The collection that contains all the individual channels.

member.name: F:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Plotter.m_PlotterPenPosition
member.summary: The position from where the plotter's pen is displayed.

member.name: F:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Plotter.m_TimeDisplayStyle
member.summary: The format in which the values on the time axis are to be shown.

member.name: F:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Plotter.m_MouseDownCoordinates
member.summary: Coordinates of the mouse when the MouseDown event occurs.

member.name: F:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Plotter.m_MouseUpCoordinates
member.summary: Coordinates of the mouse when the MouseUp event occurs.

member.name: F:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Plotter.m_InitialPlotIntervalMs
member.summary: Initial plot rate. This is required as the user can change the plot rate during the plotting.

member.name: F:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Plotter.m_StoppedLeftDisplayLimit
member.summary: The time value on the left edge of the plotter when the plotter was stopped.

member.name: F:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Plotter.m_CompressedMode
member.summary: A flag that indicates whether the compressed mode is active. True, indicates that the plotter is showing the graphs in compressed format; otherwise, false.

member.name: F:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Plotter.m_SavedXRange
member.summary: The previously stored x range. This is used while toggling the compressedMode.

member.name: F:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Plotter.m_SavedLeftDisplayLimit
member.summary: The previously stored leftDisplayLimit. This is used while toggling the compressedMode.

member.name: F:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Plotter.m_SavedPointsToRemove
member.summary: The previously stored pointsToRemove. This is used while toggling the compressedMode.

member.name: M:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Plotter.#ctor
member.summary: Creates and initializes a new plotter component.

member.summary: Clean up the resources used by the user control.
member.param: True, to release both managed and unmanaged resources; false to release only unmanaged resources.

member.name: M:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Plotter.OnPaint(System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs)
member.summary: Event handler for the Paint event.
member.param: Parameter passed from the object that raised the event.

member.name: M:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Plotter.Plotter_Leave(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Event handler for the Leave event. Update the PlotterRangeSelection static structure and trigger a StartTimeChanged event.
member.param: Reference to the object that raised the event.
Parameter passed from the object that raised the event.

member.name: M:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Plotter.Plotter_GotFocus(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Event handler for the GotFocus event. Update the PlotterRangeSelection static structure and trigger a StartTimeChanged event.
member.param: Reference to the object that raised the event.
Parameter passed from the object that raised the event.

member.name: M:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Plotter.Plotter_MouseLeave(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Event handler for the MouseLeave event. Tidies up the XY text box and cross hairs. If the multi cursor property is asserted this event handler will raise the MultiCursorMouseMove event.
member.param: Reference to the object that raised the event.
Parameter passed from the object that raised the event.

member.name: M:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Plotter.Plotter_MouseMove(System.Object,System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs)
member.summary: Event handler for the MouseMove event. When the mouse pointer moves over the control the coordinates are captured and are used to display the coordinate text box in stop mode. If the multi cursor property is asserted this event handler will raise the MultiCursorMouseMove event.
member.param: Reference to the object that raised the event.
Parameter passed from the object that raised the event.

member.name: M:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Plotter.Plotter_MultiCursorMouseMove(System.Object,System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs)
member.summary: Event handler for the MultiCursorMouseMove event. If the Visible property is asserted, sets the mouse hover coordinates to the values passed by the event arguments and then refreshes the display.
member.param: Reference to the object that raised the event.
Parameter passed from the object that raised the event.

member.name: M:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Plotter.Plotter_MouseDown(System.Object,System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs)
member.summary: Event handler for the MouseDown event.
member.param: Reference to the object that raised the event.
Parameter passed from the object that raised the event.

member.name: M:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Plotter.Plotter_MouseUp(System.Object,System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs)
member.summary: Event handler for the MouseUp event.
member.param: Reference to the object that raised the event.
Parameter passed from the object that raised the event.

Parameter passed from the object that raised the event.

member.name: M:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Plotter.Draw(System.Drawing.Graphics)
member.summary: The main drawing routine.
member.param: Reference to the The GDI+ drawing surface.

member.name: M:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Plotter.DrawXYText(System.Drawing.Graphics)
member.summary: Draw the X and Y coordinates for the active channel.
member.remarks: The plotter must be in stop mode and the mouse hover coordinates must be within the graph area.
member.param: Reference to the GDI+ drawing surface.

member.name: M:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Plotter.DrawTripTime(System.Drawing.Graphics)
member.summary: Draw a vertical line to represent the time of the actual trip.
member.remarks: Only relevant if the plot is a fault log and the plotter is in stop mode.
member.param: Reference to the GDI+ drawing surface.

member.name: M:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Plotter.DrawSelectedArea(System.Drawing.Graphics)
member.summary: Draw the selected area.
member.remarks: The plotter must be in stop mode.
member.param: Reference to the GDI+ drawing surface.

member.name: M:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Plotter.DrawCrossHair(System.Drawing.Graphics)
member.summary: Draw the cross hair vertical line.
member.remarks: The plotter must be in stop mode and the mouse hover coordinates must be within the graph area.
member.param: Reference to the GDI+ drawing surface.

member.name: M:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Plotter.DrawXAxisValues(System.Drawing.Graphics)
member.summary: Draw the x axis values for the currently selected channel.
member.param: Reference to the GDI+ drawing surface.

member.name: M:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Plotter.DrawYAxisValues(System.Drawing.Graphics)
member.summary: Draw the y axis value for the currently selected channel
member.remarks: To display the digital state on the Logic Analyser, the number of Y graduations is set to 3 and the Max and Min values are set to (float) 3.0 and 0.0 respectively. The true state of the digital is represented by setting the channel value to 2.0 and the false state is represented by setting the channel value to 1.0. These values are then mapped to display 1 and 0 respectively.
member.param: Reference to the GDI+ drawing surface.

member.name: M:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Plotter.AddToPointsListArray(CodeProject.GraphComponents.Channel)
member.summary: Create a jagged array of ArrayLists containing the points to be plotted for each block of data.
member.param: The channel reference.
member.returns: An array of ArrayLists containing the points to be plotted for each block.

member.name: M:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Plotter.PlotPointsListArray(System.Drawing.Graphics,System.Boolean,CodeProject.GraphComponents.Channel,System.Collections.ArrayList[])
member.summary: Plot the points contained within the specified ArrayList[]. Each element of ArrayList[] contains a continuous set of points to be plotted. If there are no gaps in the data to be plotted the array will contain a single element.
member.param: Reference to the The GDI+ drawing surface.
True, if the specified channel is the active channel; otherwise false.
The channel reference.
An array of ArrayLists where each element of the array contains the points to be plotted for each continuous block of data.

member.name: M:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Plotter.YAxisPlus
member.summary: Increase the active channel Y axis values by 5%.

member.name: M:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Plotter.YAxisMinus
member.summary: Lower the active channel Y axis values by 5%.

member.name: M:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Plotter.PreviousChannel
member.summary: Change to the previous channel. Just like a remote control channel changer for a TV.

member.name: M:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Plotter.NextChannel
member.summary: Change to the next channel. Just like a remote control channel changer for a TV.

member.name: M:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Plotter.UpdateDisplay
member.summary: Update the graph display. This method is called when all plot values have been set and the values are to be displayed.

member.name: M:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Plotter.Start
member.summary: Start plotting.

member.name: M:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Plotter.Stop
member.summary: Stop plotting. The user can now view the graphs.

member.name: M:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Plotter.Reset
member.summary: Reset the plotter. Erases the graphs and gets ready to start the whole plotting process again. To start once again, call Start () after calling Reset ().

member.name: M:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Plotter.GetFormatForTime(System.Int64)
member.summary: Get a string representation of the time to be displayed on the X axis depending upon the TimeAxisStyle property.
member.param: The time, in ms, relative to the start of the plot.
member.returns: A string representation of the specified time.

member.name: M:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Plotter.GetCoordinateTextRect(System.Drawing.SizeF)
member.summary: Get the coordinates of the coordinate text box that is used to display the current value of the active channel graph on the plotter.

member.name: M:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Plotter.GetPixelFromValue(CodeProject.GraphComponents.Channel,System.Int32,System.Single)
member.summary: Convert the PointF.X and PoinF.Y values (time and engineering value) for a particular channel into the relative pixel values for the GraphArea.
member.remarks: GraphArea.Top, GraphArea.Left corresponds to the pixel coordinates 0,0.
member.param: The channel reference.
The PointF.X value i.e. time, in ms, since the start of the plot.
The PointF.Y value i.e. engineering value.

member.name: M:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Plotter.GetValueFromPixel(CodeProject.GraphComponents.Channel,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Convert the specified pixel position into the corresponding PointF.X (time, in ms, since the start of the plot) and PointF.Y (engineering value) for the specified channel. Used when the mouse coordinates need to be converted to real values.
member.remarks: GraphArea.Top, GraphArea.Left corresponds to the pixel coordinates 0,0.
member.param: The channel reference.
The X pixel value.
The Y pixel value.
member.returns: A PointF value containing the converted time, in ms, from the start of the plot and the corresponding engineering value.

member.name: M:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Plotter.FindY(System.Int64,CodeProject.GraphComponents.Channel)
member.summary: Find the engineering value corresponding to the specified time. If an entry corresponding to the specified time does not exist, the value corresponding to the nearest valid time entry which is greater than the specified time is returned.
member.param: The time, in ms, from the start of the plot.
The channel reference that is currently being plotted.
member.returns: The engineering value corresponding to the specified time or, if this does not exist, the value corresponding to the nearest valid time entry which is greater than the specified time. If no entry for the specified time exists and there are no valid time entries that are greater than the specified time Float.NaN is returned.

member.name: M:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Plotter.CalculateGraphArea
member.summary: Calculate the graph area.

member.name: M:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Plotter.OnStartTimeChanged(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Raise a StartTimeChanged event.
member.param: Reference to the object that raised the event.
Parameter passed from the object that raised the event.

member.name: M:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Plotter.OnStopTimeChanged(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Raise a StopTimeChanged event.
member.param: Reference to the object that raised the event.
Parameter passed from the object that raised the event.

member.summary: Raise the PlotterStateChanged event.

Parameter passed from the object that raised the event.

member.name: E:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Plotter.StartTimeChanged
member.summary: Raised when the user selects a new start time for the plot.

member.name: E:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Plotter.StopTimeChanged
member.summary: Raised when the user selects a new stop time for the plot.

member.name: E:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Plotter.PlotterStateChanged
member.summary: Raised whenever a parameter of the plotter has changed.

member.name: E:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Plotter.MultiCursorMouseMove
member.summary: Occurs whenever the mouse pointer is moved over the component and the property that controls whether all visible cursors are displayed is asserted.

member.name: P:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Plotter.CurrentRangeSelection
member.summary: Gets or sets the current status of the range selection process.

member.name: P:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Plotter.StartTime
member.summary: Gets or sets the start time of the plot.

member.name: P:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Plotter.IsFaultLog
member.summary: Gets or sets whether the plot corresponds to fault log data. True, represents fault log data; otherwise false.

member.name: P:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Plotter.TripTime
member.summary: Gets or sets the time of the actual trip, as a .NET DateTime object.
member.remarks: Only applicable if the data being plotted corresponds to a fault log.

member.name: P:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Plotter.AnalogueType
member.summary: Gets or sets the type of analogue to be plotted: single-analogue or triple-analogue.

member.name: P:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Plotter.YAxisColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the color of the Y axis.

member.name: P:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Plotter.GraphMarginLeft
member.summary: Gets or sets the left side margin width of the graph.

member.name: P:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Plotter.GraphMarginTop
member.summary: Gets or sets the upper margin width of the graph.

member.name: P:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Plotter.GraphMarginRight
member.summary: Gets or sets the right side margin width of the graph.

member.name: P:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Plotter.GraphMarginBottom
member.summary: Gets or sets the lower margin width of the graph.
member.remarks: In stopped/pause a scroll bar appears if the graphs don't fit. Ensure that the scroll bar height is also taken into account.

member.name: P:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Plotter.Channels
member.summary: Gets the collection of channels associated with the plot.

member.name: P:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Plotter.XRange
member.summary: Gets or sets the range of the plot i.e. the time-span between the start-time to the stop-time.

member.name: P:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Plotter.PlotIntervalMs
member.summary: Gets or sets the interval, in ms, between successive plot updates. Used when displaying live data.

member.name: P:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Plotter.DataIntervalMs
member.summary: Gets or sets the interval, in ms, between successive data entries saved in the channel reference. Used when displaying historic data.

member.name: P:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Plotter.CompressedMode
member.summary: Gets or sets whether the plotter is to display the graphs in a compressed format so that all the data fits in the graph area. This mode can be set only when the plotter is either paused or stopped.

member.name: P:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Plotter.CurrentState
member.summary: Gets the current state of the plotter.

member.name: P:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Plotter.ActiveChannelIndex
member.summary: Gets the index of the currently active channel. To change to the next channel, use NextChannel () and PrevChannel ().

member.name: P:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Plotter.ActiveChannel
member.summary: Gets the currently active channel. To change to the next channel, use NextChannel () and PrevChannel ().

member.name: P:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Plotter.TimeDisplayStyle
member.summary: Gets or sets the style in which the values on the time axis (X axis) are to be shown.

member.name: P:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Plotter.TotalTimeElapsed
member.summary: Gets or sets the total time elapsed, in ms, since plotting began.

member.name: P:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Plotter.ValueFormat
member.summary: Gets or sets the .NET style of format for displaying the value and axis. Eg. {0:F}, {0:E} etc.

member.name: P:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Plotter.MouseHoverCoordinates
member.summary: Gets or sets the current mouse hover coordinates.

member.name: P:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Plotter.MultiCursor
member.summary: Gets or sets the static flag that controls whether: (true) the cursors for all visible plots are displayed or (false) only the cursor associated with the selected control is displayed.

member.name: P:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Plotter.SelectedControlList
member.summary: Gets a generic list of the selected user controls.

member.name: T:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Plotter.PlotterEventHandler
member.summary: Delegate for the event handler associated with PlotterStateChanged event.

member.name: T:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Channel
member.summary: This class defines the channel information associated with the plot; in this case, the word channel is derived from the name used to represent the input terminals of an oscilloscope.

member.name: F:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Channel.FloatRepresentationOfSet
member.summary: To use the plotter in LogicAnalyser mode, the channel value is set to 0.9 to represent a true state. Value: 0.9.

member.name: F:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Channel.FloatRepresentationOfClear
member.summary: To use the plotter in LogicAnalyser mode, the channel value is set to 0.1 to represent a clear state. Value: 0.1.

member.name: F:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Channel.DefaultActiveChannel
member.summary: The default active channel. Value: 0.

member.name: F:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Channel.DefaultMaxValue
member.summary: The default maximum value. Value: 100.

member.name: F:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Channel.DefaultMinValue
member.summary: The default minimum value. Value: 0.

member.name: F:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Channel.DefaultDataIntervalMs
member.summary: The default interval, in ms, between successive data entries saved to the channel. Value: 50.

member.name: F:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Channel.MaxPoints
member.summary: Size the generic list to cope with 40 minutes worth of data recorded every 50ms. Value: 48,000.

member.name: F:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Channel.m_IsDisposed
member.summary: Ensure Dispose method is only called once.

member.name: F:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Channel.m_DefaultMinimumValue
member.summary: The default minimum value i.e before manipulating the Y axis limits.

member.name: F:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Channel.m_DefaultMaximumValue
member.summary: The default maximum value i.e before manipulating the Y axis limits.

member.name: F:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Channel.m_MinimumValue
member.summary: The minimum value to display on the Y axis.

member.name: F:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Channel.m_MaximumValue
member.summary: The maximum value to display on the Y axis.

member.name: F:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Channel.m_CurrentValue
member.summary: The current y value of the channel.

member.name: F:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Channel.m_Name
member.summary: The Y axis name e.g. Voltage, Current etc.

member.name: F:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Channel.m_Enabled
member.summary: A flag to indicate whether the channel is enabled. True, indicates that the channel is enabled; otherwise, false.

member.name: F:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Channel.m_ChannelColor
member.summary: The pen colour associated with the channel.

member.name: F:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Channel.m_CursorOffset
member.summary: The offset of the cursor from the center line.

member.name: F:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Channel.m_ChannelCursor
member.summary: The X axis cursor line associated with the channel.

member.name: F:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Channel.m_TotalTimeElapsed
member.summary: The total time elapsed, in ms, since the start of the plot.

member.name: F:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Channel.m_PlotIntervalMs
member.summary: The interval, in ms, between successive plots, default = 100ms.

member.name: F:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Channel.m_Points
member.summary: A generic list of PointF items containing the Y and corresponding time values of the data that is to be plotted.

member.name: F:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Channel.m_X
member.summary: A generic list of long integers containing only the PointF.X values of the data that is to be plotted. Helps with the search facility.

member.name: F:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Channel.m_BreakPoint
member.summary: A generic list of long integers containing those PointF.X values marking a break in the plot sequence i.e.transparent pen should be used to plot between this plot entry and the next.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Channel.Finalize
member.summary: Destructor / Finalizer. Because Dispose calls GC.SuppressFinalize, this method is called by the garbage collection process only if the consumer of the object doesn't call Dispose as it should.

member.name: M:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Channel.Dispose
member.summary: Public implementation of the IDisposable.Dispose method, called by the consumer of the object in order to free unmanaged resources deterministically.

member.name: M:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Channel.Dispose(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Tidy-up all resources.
member.param: Specifies whether the method is being called by the consumer code (true), or the garbage collector (false).

member.name: M:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Channel.SetYTValue(System.Single,System.Int64)
member.summary: Add the y value and corresponding monitor real time clock offset since start of recording into an ArrayList for use by the plotter control.
member.param: The y value associated with the specified time.
The time, in ms, of the 'CurrentMonitorTime' value of the current record minus the 'StartTime' of the X axis display.

member.name: M:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Channel.SetState(System.Boolean,System.Int64)
member.summary: Add the state and the corresponding monitor real time clock offset since start of recording into an ArrayList for use by the plotter control.
member.param: The digital state associated with the specified time.
The time, in ms, of the 'CurrentMonitorTime' value of the current record minus the 'StartTime' of the X axis display.

member.name: M:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Channel.SetBreakPoint(System.Int64)
member.summary: Record a break in the plot sequence of a log i.e the start of a period where the unit has been powered down. The break point is specified as the time, in ms, since the start of the plot. During these power down periods the pen colour of the plot is set to transparent.
member.param: The time, in ms, since the 'StartTime' of the X axis display, where the break point is to be recorded.

member.name: M:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Channel.Reset
member.summary: Clear the generic lists associated with the channel. This must be carried out whenever the data values to be plotted are updated.

member.name: P:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Channel.MinimumValue
member.summary: Gets or sets the minimum value associated with the Y axis.

member.name: P:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Channel.MaximumValue
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum value associated with the Y axis.

member.name: P:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Channel.DefaultMaximumValue
member.summary: Gets or sets the default maximum value i.e. the maximum value associated with the Y axis before manipulating the limits.

member.name: P:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Channel.DefaultMinimumValue
member.summary: Gets or sets the default minimum value i.e. the minimum value associated with the Y axis before manipulating the limits.

member.name: P:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Channel.CurrentValue
member.summary: Gets or sets the current value.

member.name: P:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Channel.State
member.summary: Gets or sets the current state.
member.remarks: Only applicable if the channel is being used to plot digital values.

member.name: P:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Channel.Enabled
member.summary: Gets or sets the flag that indicates whether the channel is enabled. True, indicates that the channel is enabled; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Channel.YAxisName
member.summary: Get or sets the name for the Y axis. Eg. Voltage, Current etc.

member.name: P:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Channel.ChannelColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the channel colour.

member.name: P:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Channel.CursorOffset
member.summary: Gets or sets the offset of the cursor from the centre line.

member.name: P:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Channel.TotalTimeElapsed
member.summary: Gets or sets the total time, in ms, between the start of the plot and the time of the current plot.

member.name: P:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Channel.PlotIntervalMs
member.summary: Gets or sets the interval, in ms, between successive plots.

member.name: P:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Channel.ChannelCursor
member.summary: Gets or sets the X axis cursor line associated with the channel.

member.name: P:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Channel.Points
member.summary: Generic list of PointF items containing the Y and corresponding time values of the data that is to be plotted.

member.name: P:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Channel.X
member.summary: Generic list of long integers containing the PointF.X values i.e. RTC values of the data that is to be plotted.

member.name: P:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Channel.BreakPoint
member.summary: Generic list of long integers containing those PointF.X values marking the breaks in the plot sequence of a min/hour/day log or RTD log i.e the times, in ms, since the start of the plot corresponding to those plot entries where the unit has been powered down until the period defined by the following plot entry time. During these power down periods the pen colour of the plot is set to transparent.

member.name: T:CodeProject.GraphComponents.ChannelCollection
member.summary: This class provides a mechanism for the user to treat the channels of the plotter as a single collection.

member.summary: Add a new Channel to the collection.
member.returns: The index of the added channel.

member.name: M:CodeProject.GraphComponents.ChannelCollection.IndexOf(CodeProject.GraphComponents.Channel)
member.summary: Returns the index of the specified channel.
member.returns: The index of the specified channel.

member.name: M:CodeProject.GraphComponents.ChannelCollection.Insert(System.Int32,CodeProject.GraphComponents.Channel)
member.summary: Inserts a channel at the specified index.

member.name: M:CodeProject.GraphComponents.ChannelCollection.Remove(CodeProject.GraphComponents.Channel)
member.summary: Removes the specified channel from the plotter.

member.name: M:CodeProject.GraphComponents.ChannelCollection.Contains(CodeProject.GraphComponents.Channel)
member.summary: Checks whether the specified channel is contained within the collection.
member.param: Reference to the channel that is to be checked.
member.returns: True, if the specified reference is contained within the collection; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:CodeProject.GraphComponents.ChannelCollection.Item(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets or sets the Channel object at the particular index.

member.name: T:CodeProject.GraphComponents.LogicAnalyzer
member.summary: A user control to plot the state of a digital variable against time.

member.name: F:CodeProject.GraphComponents.LogicAnalyzer.TransparencyXYText
member.summary: The transparency of the XYText. Value: 50.

member.name: F:CodeProject.GraphComponents.LogicAnalyzer.m_TextAsserted
member.summary: The text that is to appear in the cursor if the digital is in the alarm state.

member.name: F:CodeProject.GraphComponents.LogicAnalyzer.m_TextClear
member.summary: The text that is to appear in the cursor if the digital is in the clear state.

member.name: F:CodeProject.GraphComponents.LogicAnalyzer.m_AlarmStatePlotColor
member.summary: The pen color that is to be used to draw the plot when the digital value is in the alarm state.

member.name: F:CodeProject.GraphComponents.LogicAnalyzer.m_AlarmStateCursorColor
member.summary: The pen color that is to be used to highlight the cursor when the digital value is in the alarm state.

member.name: F:CodeProject.GraphComponents.LogicAnalyzer.m_ClearStateCursorColor
member.summary: The pen color that is to be used to highlight the cursor when the digital value is in the clear state.

member.name: F:CodeProject.GraphComponents.LogicAnalyzer.m_ClearStatePlotColor
member.summary: The pen color that is to be used to draw the plot when the digital value is in the clear state.

member.name: F:CodeProject.GraphComponents.LogicAnalyzer.m_AlarmState
member.summary: The digital state that represents an active alarm. The default state is TRUE i.e. low to high transition represents an alarm.

member.name: M:CodeProject.GraphComponents.LogicAnalyzer.#ctor
member.summary: Creates and initializes a new logic analyzer user control.

member.name: M:CodeProject.GraphComponents.LogicAnalyzer.Cleanup(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Clean up the resources used by the user control.
member.param: True, to release both managed and unmanaged resources; false to release only unmanaged resources.

member.name: M:CodeProject.GraphComponents.LogicAnalyzer.Draw(System.Drawing.Graphics)
member.summary: The main drawing routine that renders the points onto the graph.
member.param: Reference to the The GDI+ drawing surface.

member.name: M:CodeProject.GraphComponents.LogicAnalyzer.DrawXYText(System.Drawing.Graphics)
member.summary: Draw the X and Y coordinates for the active channel.
member.remarks: The plotter must be in stop mode and the mouse hover coordinates must be within the graph area.
member.param: Reference to the GDI+ drawing surface.

member.name: M:CodeProject.GraphComponents.LogicAnalyzer.AddToPointsListArray(CodeProject.GraphComponents.Channel)
member.summary: Create an array of ArrayLists containing the points to be plotted for each block of data. This method also adds the required points into the ArrayList[] so that the digital state transitions appear as a vertical line.
member.param: The channel reference.
member.returns: An array of ArrayLists containing the points to be plotted for each block.

member.name: M:CodeProject.GraphComponents.LogicAnalyzer.PlotPointsListArray(System.Drawing.Graphics,CodeProject.GraphComponents.Channel,System.Collections.ArrayList[])
member.summary: Plot the points contained within the specified ArrayList[]. Each element of ArrayList[] contains a continuous set of points to be plotted. If there are no gaps in the data to be plotted the array will contain a single element.
member.param: Reference to the The GDI+ drawing surface.
The channel reference.
An array of ArrayLists where each element of the array contains the points to be plotted for each continuous block of data.

member.name: F:CodeProject.GraphComponents.LogicAnalyzer.components
member.summary: Required Designer Variable.

member.name: M:CodeProject.GraphComponents.LogicAnalyzer.InitializeComponent
member.summary: Required method for Designer support - do not modify the contents of this method with the code editor.

member.name: P:CodeProject.GraphComponents.LogicAnalyzer.AlarmState
member.summary: Gets or sets the alarm state associated with a digital plot.
member.remarks: The default state is TRUE i.e. low to high transition represents an alarm.

member.name: T:CodeProject.GraphComponents.ScreenCapture
member.summary: Class to provide support functions to capture the entire desktop or a particular window and save it to disk in the specified format.

member.name: M:CodeProject.GraphComponents.ScreenCapture.CaptureScreen
member.summary: Capture a screen shot of the entire desktop.
member.returns: The desktop as an Image object.

member.name: M:CodeProject.GraphComponents.ScreenCapture.CaptureWindow(System.IntPtr)
member.summary: Capture a screen shot of a specific window.
member.param: The window handle.
member.remarks: The window handleis obtained using the Handleproperty of the Form class.
member.returns: The window as an Image object.

member.name: M:CodeProject.GraphComponents.ScreenCapture.CaptureWindowToFile(System.IntPtr,System.String,System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat)
member.summary: Capture a screen shot of a specific window and saves it to disk.
member.param: The window handle.
The fully qualified file name.
The graphics format associated with the saved file e.g. png, jpg, bmp etc.
member.remarks: The window handleis obtained using the Handleproperty of the Form class.

member.name: M:CodeProject.GraphComponents.ScreenCapture.CaptureScreenToFile(System.String,System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat)
member.summary: Capture a screen shot of the entire desktop and save it to disk.
member.param: The fully qualified file name.
The graphics format associated with the saved file e.g. png, jpg, bmp etc.

member.name: T:CodeProject.GraphComponents.ScreenCapture.GDI32

The X coordinate of the device context where the bitmap is to be copied from.
The Y coordinate of the device context where the bitmap is to be copied from.
The width of the bitmap.
The height of the bitmap.

The X coordinate of the device context where the bitmap is to be copied to.
The y coordinate of the device context where the bitmap is to be copied to.

member.name: P:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Properties.Resources.TextAsserted
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Asserted.

member.name: P:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Properties.Resources.TextClear
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Clear.

member.name: T:CodeProject.GraphComponents.PlotterRangeSelection
member.summary: A structure to manage the range selection process.

member.name: F:CodeProject.GraphComponents.PlotterRangeSelection.InitialStartTime
member.summary: The initial start time of the plot.

member.name: F:CodeProject.GraphComponents.PlotterRangeSelection.InitialStopTime
member.summary: The initial stop time of the plot.

member.name: F:CodeProject.GraphComponents.PlotterRangeSelection.ZoomedStartTime
member.summary: The start time of the plot if it is zoomed in; otherwise, DateTime.MinValue.

member.name: F:CodeProject.GraphComponents.PlotterRangeSelection.ZoomedStopTime
member.summary: The stop time of the plot if it is zoomed in; otherwise, DateTime.MinValue.

member.name: F:CodeProject.GraphComponents.PlotterRangeSelection.TripTime
member.summary: The actual time of the trip, if the data corresponds to a fault log.

member.name: F:CodeProject.GraphComponents.PlotterRangeSelection.StartTime
member.summary: The selected start time of the new plot.

member.name: F:CodeProject.GraphComponents.PlotterRangeSelection.StopTime
member.summary: The selected stop time of the new plot.

member.name: F:CodeProject.GraphComponents.PlotterRangeSelection.TimeSpan
member.summary: The time span associated with the selected start and stop times.

member.name: F:CodeProject.GraphComponents.PlotterRangeSelection.PlotIntervalMs
member.summary: The interval, in ms, between successive plot value updates.
member.remarks: This is associated with the live data display.

member.name: F:CodeProject.GraphComponents.PlotterRangeSelection.DataIntervalMs
member.summary: The interval,in ms, between successive plot values saved in the channel reference.
member.remarks: This is associated with the historic data display.

member.name: F:CodeProject.GraphComponents.PlotterRangeSelection.LastPlotterRangeSelectionState
member.summary: The state associated with the last individual plotter instance state that was modified.

member.name: F:CodeProject.GraphComponents.PlotterRangeSelection.m_PlotterRangeSelectionState
member.summary: Stores the state of an individual plotter instance.

member.name: M:CodeProject.GraphComponents.PlotterRangeSelection.SetTimeSpanToZero
member.summary: Sets the time span of the plot to zero, this is used when the start time has been set but the stop time has not yet been selected.

member.name: M:CodeProject.GraphComponents.PlotterRangeSelection.CalculateTimeSpan
member.summary: Calculate the new time span of the plot from the specified start and stop times.

member.name: M:CodeProject.GraphComponents.PlotterRangeSelection.Reset
member.summary: Reset the start and stop times to the initial/default values and update the time span accordingly.

member.name: P:CodeProject.GraphComponents.PlotterRangeSelection.PlotterRangeSelectionState
member.summary: Gets or sets the state corresponding to an individual plotter instance.

member.name: T:CodeProject.GraphComponents.AnalogueType
member.summary: An enumerator to specify the type of analogue IO that is to be plotted. TripleAnalogue for triple-analogue IO points and SingleAnalogue for single-analogue IO points.

member.name: F:CodeProject.GraphComponents.AnalogueType.TripleAnalogue
member.summary: Plot for triple analogues.

member.name: F:CodeProject.GraphComponents.AnalogueType.SingleAnalogue
member.summary: Plot for single analogues.

member.name: T:CodeProject.GraphComponents.PlotterRangeSelectionState
member.summary: The different states associated with the plotter range selection process.

member.name: F:CodeProject.GraphComponents.PlotterRangeSelectionState.NewPlotterRangeSelected
member.summary: The 'Select New Plotter Range' context menu option has been selected.

member.name: F:CodeProject.GraphComponents.PlotterRangeSelectionState.StartTimeSelected
member.summary: The start time of the plotter range has been selected.

member.name: F:CodeProject.GraphComponents.PlotterRangeSelectionState.StopTimeSelected
member.summary: Both the start and stop times of the plotter range have been selected.

member.name: F:CodeProject.GraphComponents.PlotterRangeSelectionState.ZoomSelected
member.summary: Valid start and stop times have been configured and the 'Zoom' context menu option has been selected.

member.name: F:CodeProject.GraphComponents.PlotterRangeSelectionState.InitialState
member.summary: In the initial state i.e. awaiting the 'Select Plotter Range' context menu option to be selected.

member.name: T:CodeProject.GraphComponents.PlotterState
member.summary: The possible states that the plotter can take.

member.name: F:CodeProject.GraphComponents.PlotterState.Reset
member.summary: The plotter is reset. All the graphs are erased and the plotter is waiting to run.

member.name: F:CodeProject.GraphComponents.PlotterState.Running
member.summary: The plotter is running. From this state the plotter may be stopped, paused or reset.

member.name: F:CodeProject.GraphComponents.PlotterState.Stopped
member.summary: The plotter has stopped plotting. The graphs can now be viewed.

member.summary: Summary description for Cursor.

member.summary: Reference to the graph area.

member.summary: Reference to the channel.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: Channel reference.

member.summary: Draw the cursor.
member.param: The graphics area.

member.name: P:CodeProject.GraphComponents.Cursor.GraphArea
member.summary: Gets or sets the graph area associated with the cursor.
